KnowledgeBase.Title: isText
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex

Function.Description: The isText function returns true is the argument is a Text type. Otherwise, it returns false.

Brief.Overview: The isText Function returns true if the argument {obj} is a Text type; otherwise, false is returned.
Brief.Usage: The isText function is used to query an object to see if it is of type Text. Alternate methods would be to use the isType function using the Type argument as type Text or one may use the isString function .

Argument.Name: obj
Argument.AISTypes: Character, String, Symbol, Vector, BitVector, ByteVector, IntVector, FltVector, ObjVector, Structure, Dictionary, Directory, Matrix, NumMatrix, Integer, Float, Number, Complex

Syntax.Return: If the object is of type Text, true is returned. Otherwise false is returned
